category.name: Quick Exercise Breaks
category.description: A collection of quick and effective exercise routines that can be easily incorporated into a busy schedule to help maintain an active lifestyle.

tasks.name: Jumping Jacks
tasks.desc: Perform jumping jacks for a quick and simple full-body warm-up exercise. This will help to get your heart rate up and improve your overall fitness.

tasks.name: Bodyweight Squats
tasks.desc: Do a set of bodyweight squats to work your lower body muscles, focusing on proper form and technique. This will help to strengthen your legs and glutes.

tasks.name: Push-ups
tasks.desc: Perform a set of push-ups to work your upper body muscles, focusing on maintaining a straight body alignment. This will help to strengthen your chest, shoulders, and triceps.

tasks.name: Plank
tasks.desc: Hold a plank position for a set amount of time, focusing on keeping your body straight and engaging your core muscles. This will help to improve your core strength and stability.

tasks.name: Stretching
tasks.desc: Spend a few minutes stretching your major muscle groups, focusing on maintaining proper form and technique. This will help to improve your flexibility and prevent injury.
